full_summary:
# Phase 2 - Bidding Invitation for Storage Barn Construction Services
================_

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4302449831-Doc4345239269
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4302449831
* **Publication Date**: December 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 27, 2023 at 14:00 EST

## Tender Details

* **Contract Name**: Storage Barn Construction Services
* **Description**: The work of this contract comprises of supplying and constructing a new 16.46m x 21.95m shop building with an eave height of 4.87m. The building will include a shop area, kitchen/office area, washroom, mechanical/electrical room, and storage mezzanine.
* **Selection Criteria**: The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the lowest price.
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Supplier Requirements

* **Qualifications**: Interested suppliers are required to submit their qualifications and supporting documentation by the tender closing date.
* **Financial Bidding**: A subsequent phase will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Tran, Admon (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [admon.tran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:admon.tran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice and Attachments

* The complete tender notice and bidding instructions can be found on the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the provided link: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18231936?extsite=MTgyMzE5MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: Please disregard the amendments below. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 27, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
